## Widget type

The type definition for the widget's default function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Widget<T extends WidgetRenderProps> = (
  props: T
) => React.JSX.Element;
```

**References:** [WidgetRenderProps](./pages.widgetrenderprops.md)
